mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_official_tag ( gmt_create, gmt_modify, name, colour) VALUES ( now(), now(), #{name}, #{colour});
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, colour FROM b_official_tag ORDER BY gmt_create DESC;

SELECT ot.id AS id, ot.name AS name, ot.colour AS colour FROM b_official_tag ot, b_service_order_official_tag soot, b_service_order so WHERE ot.id = soot.official_tag_id AND soot.service_order_id = so.id AND so.id = #{serviceOrderId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY ot.gmt_create DESC;
SELECT id, name, colour FROM b_official_tag WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER};
SELECT t.id, t.name, t.colour FROM b_official_tag t, b_service_order_official_tag st WHERE t.id = st.official_tag_id AND st.service_order_id = #{serviceOrderId, jdbcType=INTEGER} LIMIT 1;
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM b_official_tag WHERE id = #{id, jdbcType=INTEGER}
